title: Delicate Diamond and Black Beads Mangalsutra Necklace (Kattimani Pusalu)
materials: and Round-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A minimalist take on the traditional Mangalsutra, featuring a delicate rose gold chain interspersed with classic black beads. Sparkling CZ Diamonds, set in a bezel setting, are suspended between sections of the beads for a touch of modern elegance. Contemporary design perfect for daily wear.
description: Combines the sacred tradition of the Mangalsutra with a contemporary and understated design. The rose gold and diamond accents offer a modern aesthetic, making it perfect for the modern woman who values tradition. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear.
